Key Match Events: The Sacramento Kings closed with a 15-0 run to rally past the Philadelphia 76ers
Pre-Game Insights: Interim coach Doug Christie was leading the team after Mike Brown was fired last week
Post-Match Reflections: The Sacramento Kings won their second consecutive home game under interim coach Doug Christie
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on Wednesday, Jan. 1, 2025, in Sacramento, Calif.
Others: Malik Monk added 20 points and six assists for the Kings
